title: HELP. Friends account has been hacked.

embed.description: PlaysTv / Diamond 5 85LP / 273W 226L Win Ratio 55% / Quinn - 26W 24L Win Ratio 52%, Blitzcrank - 25W 18L Win Ratio 58%, Shyvana - 29W 13L Win Ratio 69%, Hecarim - 20W 17L Win Ratio 54%, Draven - 27W 6L Win Ratio 82%

body:
My friends account has been hacked last night, he tried logging on today but he couldn't. He tried the 'Forgot your password' link but he doesn't receive the email (so whomever hacked the account change the associated email address). He also tried the 'Forgot you username' link but his summoner name 'PlaysTv' doesn't come up. The account is Diamond 5 as you can see so it is pretty frustrating that this has happened. 

Would love some help about what he can do to recover his account.
Thanks.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Your friend is going to have to submit an [account recovery request](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) via Player Support, we here on the boards are unable to assist with account specific issues.
